overview: No Gas. A redundant Gas oven. Barely any moneyâ€¦ and its Christmas! So what does Paul do with the little money he does have...? He buys a turkey and all the trimmings in the blind hope that everything will be ok - the gas will come back magically and he can provide a normal Christmas for his wife and kids... Sometimes hope is enough to keep you going.
title: All the Trimmings
